thread.title: Watch Netflix’s First Trailer for the Live-Action ‘Death Note’ Movie
thread.title_full: Watch Netflix’s First Trailer for the Live-Action ‘Death Note’ Movie

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Watch Netflix’s First Trailer for the Live-Action ‘Death Note’ Movie
text:
Subscribe to Highsnobiety on YouTube 
Nat Wolff stars as Light Turner in Netflix’s upcoming live-action film Death Note . Upon finding said Death Note, Turner quickly discovers that whoever is named in the supernatural book will soon die, so he decides to use the tool for good by killing criminals. 
Blair Witch director Adam Wingard heads up the direction for the picture, based on the popular 2003 manga series of the same name. Alongside Wolff, Death Note stars Willem Dafoe, Keith Stanfield and Margaret Qualley. 
You can look forward to the original movie arriving on Netflix August 25. 
For more upcoming heat from Netflix, see below to watch the initial teaser for season two of Aziz Ansari’s Master of None .
